item.title: Elvis Presley - Hound Dog
item.description:
Ukulele play along - Very Easy
Hound Dog - Elvis Presley Written by Jerry Leiber and Mike Stoller
Using the chords: C F G7
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: The Beach Boys - In My Room
item.description:
For educational use.
Chords Used: C Bb Am Dm G G7
In My Room by The Beach Boys. It’s been raised by 1 semitone so beginner ukulele students can play along. The chords have been added to a lyric video that was created by YouTuber rainbow4121 which may be found here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-b5WsEDZvsE.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6 . We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Chihiro Otsuka - Baby Mine (From "Dumbo"/Soundtrack Version)
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C.
Chords Used: C, Dm, G7, F, Cmaj7
From Dumbo (2019 Motion Picture)
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/LyqCyg853Fs
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
And please visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (free).
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: The Dell Vikings - Come Go With Me (Master)
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of G.
Chords Used: G, Em, Am, D7, C7, G7
As performed by the Del-Vikings
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/rprSsbEBBzI
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com.
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff

item.title: Dawn - Tie a Yellow Ribbon Round the Ole Oak Tree
item.description: Performed by Tony Orlando & Dawn Written by Irwin Levine & L. Russel Brown

item.title: Glee Cast - Feliz Navidad (Glee Cast Version)
item.description:
For educational use.
Chords Used: C F G (or G7) Am
Glee’s cover version of Feliz Navidad by sung by Artie Abrams (Kevin McHale) In Season 4 Episode 10. It’s been lowered by 2 semitones so beginner ukulele students can play along.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6 . We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Ciara - Beauty Marks
item.description: For Educational Use. Chords used in this song: F, A7, Gm, Dm, G7, C, B flat, and Am

item.title: Stevie Wonder - Faith (From "Sing" Original Motion Picture Soundtrack)
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Faith on the ukulele by Stevie Wonder and Ariana Grande. The chords used are G7 C7 D7.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on the bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The uke chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Kacey Musgraves - Rainbow
item.description: For Educational Use. Chords Used: F, Dm, B flat, C A7, G7, and G

item.title: Hank Williams - Jambalaya
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of C.
Chords Used: C, G7
As performed by Hank Williams.
Dr. Reese has had a video of this available for a long time, but the original recording was in a different tuning. This version has been adjusted to A440.
This video was also blocked on YouTube since it was published (Feb 2, 2019), but the copyright holders recently removed the restrictions on the video.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
There is a master list of all similar play along videos at my blog: ukestuff.info. Access to the blog, and all materials on the blog is free.
Want to make a song suggestion? Follow the link and fill out the form! https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScvgacvP7hB46DGeJ8o6Gsn7V8JAPsHFo7G-Q4TkiHsILBiAw/viewform?usp=sf_link
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. Patreon rewards include access to my “method” of the video play alongs (to be used in a classroom) as well as some other resources, and starting in 2019, a chord sheet of every song posted as a play along.
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel!
